::Seekker::
Seekker looked to the two then to the shipm then back to 
them. "Sigh.." as he lets his gun flip back onot his back. He jumps 
and transforms joing hte other two. "It would look prettier too..." 
he sighed. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Lokk / Axis ---
> 
> Axis grabs Seekker, "No don't do that!" He exclaims in shock, 
> Lokk wants the pod in one piece, not in many pieces."
> 
> Lokk sighs, "That's true, Axis, I would like to bring it back with 
> me." Lokk opens a commlink to Nightlight, "Ok, we're going to 
> bring the pob back with us, provided that Seekker doesn't decide to 
> let his machineguns eat it." He chuckles, and closes the commlink.
> "Ok, Axis transform and I'll attach some cords and such to you and 
> the pod so that we can drag it." Axis obliges, transforming and he 
> waits for Lokk.
> 
> Lokk takes some cords out one of Axis' compartments (which were 
> convieniently there =P), and attaches the securely to the pod and 
> to Axis. He then transforms into his part of the Large Hover Jet, 
> and attaches to Axis. Both wait for the slightly insane Seekker.
> 
> 
> 
> On 12 Jun 2001, at 4:40, gunthers8@n... wrote:
> 
> > ::Seekker::
> > "Hey Lokk shut up....I got it covered." he said pulling out his 
two
> > miniguns. "I figure, if I shoot it up alot, I can get it inot 
smaller
> > peices and we can bring it back liek that."
